text: Aralia malabarica is a species of plant in the family Araliaceae. It is endemic to India. ==References== World Conservation Monitoring Centre. 1998. Aralia malabarica. In: IUCN 2012. IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2012.2. Downloaded on 30 June 2013 Category:Endemic flora of India (region) malabarica Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Aralia malabarica
